channel.title: --rep should have more impact
channel.description:
I've been 200 rep for years now and still if I ever --rep someone it only takes them down 1 reputation, they then ask one of their friends to ++rep them and they gain 13 rep. I know rep means nothing really but it seems foolish to have it at all if it has no advantage.
I think people would think more carefully prior to posting if they thought their rep could be seriously affected. Right now even if 13 people --rep you, you only need 1 single ++rep to be back where you was before. I think ++rep and --rep should increase/decrease the same amounts. :)
